title: United Kingdom HMRC tax receipts 2000 - 2019 : corporation tax
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Total, and Offshore. The y axis indicates the Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Total is gradually increasing, Offshore is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Total, and lastly, 2. Offshore.
Overall across the Year, Total mostly maintained the highest Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP when compared to others with a mean value of 38727.53, and it peaked at 2018/19.
Offshore mostly had the least Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP with a mean value of 4274.74, which peaked at 2008/09 with a value of 9826.0.
yAxis: Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP

Overall Total is gradually increasing, Offshore is roughly constant,  throughout the Year

max_summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Total, and Offshore. The y axis indicates the Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Total is gradually increasing, Offshore is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP in descending order is: 1. Total, and lastly, 2. Offshore.

Throughout the period, Total generally had the highest Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP relative to others with an average of 38727.53, and it reached its maximum at 2018/19 with a value of 57202.0.
Offshore mostly had the least Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP with a mean value of 4274.74, which peaked at 2008/09 with a value of 9826.0.
The greatest difference of Corporation Tax receipts in milliom GBP between Total and Offshore occurs at Year 2018/19 and the smallest difference occurs at 2002/03.
